name: 葉采青
objective: 本課程旨在提高學生的英文閱讀能力及寫作技巧。透過細讀世界短篇英文小說，課程介紹如何分析故事敘述、角色刻畫、 情感刻畫及文學意象等技巧。學生將依課程所學進行口頭報告和短句寫作練習。
schedule:
Week 1  Orientation　　
Week 2  “Cat in the Rain” (1925), Ernest Hemingway　　
Week 3   “The Story of an Hour” (1894), Kate Chopin　　
Week 4 　　 “At the Barber’s” (1883), Anton Chekhov　　
Week 5   Discussion　　
Week 6　　 “Eveline” (1914), James Joyce　　
Week 7　　 “The Last Leaf
Week 8  　　 Review / Midterm exam　　
Week 9　　 Midterm Proficiency Test　　
Week 10  “The Fly” (1922), Katherine Mansfield　　#1
Week 11　　 “The Birthmark” (1843), Nathaniel Hawthorne　　
Week 12　　 “A Dog's Tale” (1903), Mark Twain　　#2
Week 13 “The Tell-Tale Heart” (1843), Edgar Allan Poe　　#3
Week 14　　 “The Lottery” (1948), Shirley Jackson　　#4
Week 15 “The Child's Story” (1852), Charles Dickens　　#5
Week 16 Discussion and review　　
Week 17 Final exam　　
Week 18　　 Final Proficiency Test
scorePolicy:
Attendance and participation: 15%
Assignment and presentation: 20%
Midterm exam: 30%
Final exam: 35%
